sentences.en: Give a gulp ; give a yelp.
sentences.cn: 做出吞咽声; 发出叫喊.

sentences.en: Her dog yelped and came to heel.
sentences.cn: 她的狗汪地叫了一声，紧跟了上来。

sentences.en: I had to bite back a yelp of surprise.
sentences.cn: 我只好强忍住，没惊叫出来。

sentences.en: Occasionally, Jaron disturbs the quiet with a yelp of delight.
sentences.cn: 偶尔, 杰伦会以一声欢叫打破平静.

sentences.en: Red Beacon also pulls in the aggregate rating from Yelp's API.
sentences.cn: 红灯塔也拉在从狗吠声的空气污染指数总体评价.

sentences.en: She gave a little yelp and fled upstairs.
sentences.cn: 她尖叫了一声,逃上楼去.

sentences.en: She is real! She can run, can bite, being tender, and yelp!
sentences.cn: 真正的活恐龙 —— 她会跑 、 咬人 、 发嗲 、 对于着你大吼!

sentences.en: She jumped back with a little yelp of surprise.
sentences.cn: 她吃惊地喊叫了一声跳了回去.

sentences.en: She let out a yelp of pain.
Some will cheer out loud; others will yelp as cherished beliefs are torn into.
sentences.cn: 有人会大声欢呼, 其他人则会因为自己珍视的信念被撕得粉碎而痛声疾呼.

sentences.en: The dog gave a yelp of pain.
The dog gave a yelp when I treaded on its paw.
sentences.cn: 我踩了那狗的爪子,它吠叫了一声.

sentences.en: The dog gave a yelp when I trod on its paw.
sentences.cn: 我踩了那狗的爪子,它揭勾叫了一声.

sentences.en: The dog give a yelp when I tread on its paw.
sentences.cn: 我踩了那狗的爪子,它丢剧?了一声.

sentences.en: The dog yelp and run off.
sentences.cn: 狗疼得大叫一声跑开了.

sentences.en: The puppy a yelp when John stepped on her tail.
sentences.cn: 当约翰踩到小狗的尾巴,小狗发出尖叫.

trans.tran_en: a short sharp high cry which a person or an animal makes because they are excited, in pain, surprised etc
If a person or dog yelps, they give a sudden short cry, often because of fear or pain
